title: Designing Mathematics Pedagogy Through Online Group Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and Fundamental Teaching Experience in Educational Settings
context.additional_context: Pre-service/in-service teachers conducting mathematics education projects using collaboration tools in smartphone environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete math problem-solving projects in online collaborative environments using social interdependence learning strategies
Learners can propose three or more practical applications of mathematical concepts through interaction with group members.
Learners can perform 80% or more of the process of developing mathematics educational materials based on peer feedback using digital collaboration tools.

resources: Open Educational Resources (OER) for Mathematics Instruction
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
